import React, { Component } from 'react' import Navbar from './Navbar' import DaiToken from '../abis/DaiToken.json' import DappToken from '../abis/DappToken.json' import TokenFarm from '../abis/TokenFarm.json' import './App.css' import Web3 from 'web3' class Main extends Component { render() { return (
Staking Balance Reward Balance
{window.web3.utils.fromWei(this.props.stakingBalace, 'ether')} mDai {window.web3.utils.fromWei(this.props.dappTokenBalance, 'ether')} DAPP
); } } export default Main;
